caption.center: IN RE: Larry Ray YOUNG Arkansas Bar No. 96188

opinion.posture: Petition for Voluntary Surrender of Law License Petition Granted.
opinion.opinion_text:
Upon recommendation of the Supreme Court Committee on Professional Conduct, we hereby accept the voluntary surrender of the law license of Larry Ray Young, Houston, Texas, to practice law in the State of Arkansas. Mr. Young's name shall be removed from the registry of licensed attorneys in this state.
It is so ordered.
